metadata.title: CVE-2021-45844 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper sanitization in the invocation of ODA File Converter from FreeCAD0.19 allows an attacker to inject OS commands via a crafted filename.

criterions.comment: freecad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
